segments.text: what took so long ? I thought your flight was supposed to arrive 3 hours ago !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: didn't they announce that our flight was delayed ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn't hear anything about a delay . I thought everything was running on time . What happened ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: we boarded the plane on time , but then we were held up for almost an hour due to a maintenance problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: then what ? Your plane was three hours late !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: we finally took off , but about 30 minutes later , the captain came on the loudspeaker to warn us that there would be some bad turbulence for most of the flight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: turbulence is pretty normal , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , but this was the worst turbulence I'd ever experienced in my life ! Everyone started getting sick . The flight attendants had to stay in their seats . The captain decided to land early .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: we landed in Southampton and waited an hour for the storms to pass and then took off again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it wasn't too bad . At lease I'm alive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: have you had anything to eat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I managed to get a sandwich from a flight attendant . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had a few coffees while I was waiting . Let's get out of here !
segments.speaker: S1
